page.title: 19A school day in Talke
page.content: When we go to school in the morning we have a short playtime until 9a.m. then we line up. From lines we walk up to the school and enter. We read or work for a while, then four people go into the hall and do jobs before assembly. After assembly English until playtime which is about fifteen minutes long. When we come back into school we usually do mathematics.At twelve o clock we either go home to have our dinner or stay for school meals.In the afternoon we do painting or drawing or craft.Or we sometimes do Science for example the other day we had to draw a bike explain about the parts on a bike.Sometimes we do History in the afternoon, the last time we talked about weaving and spinning.Also we do Geography.There is a playtime at 2.30 and we might do P.E. after.At quarter to four we go home.
